Hero.title: Hello, I am
Hero.subtitle: Got an app idea? I'll make it happen.

About.title: Bruno Lima
About.subtitle: Front End Developer
About.description:
My name is Bruno, I'm a front-end developer with 2 years of experience and a degree in Systems Analysis and Development from FATEC.
I'm also open to freelance opportunities, helping to transform website or app ideas into real projects. If you'd like to discuss your project, just get in touch!

companies.description: I develop modern and responsive websites focused on user experience, API integration, SEO optimization, and structured data implementation for better visibility and ranking in search engines.
I develop modern and responsive websites focused on user experience, API integration, SEO optimization, and structured data implementation for better visibility and ranking in search engines.
